sense.def: Etiological Agent. of phlegm aggregation brought forth by fright. Yi xue ru men 醫學入門 5: 汗吐下温俱從 緩，免動驚痰與蛔蟲 , “[Therapeutic approaches of] causing sweating, vomiting, purging, and warming are to be conducted with mild strength only, lest one should activate fright phlegm or roundworms”. Jing ti 驚啼 , fright crying [25]
Alternative Names jing ku 驚哭.

Illness Sign of children suddenly waking up and crying as if frightened. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry ling li jia 鯪鯉甲：主五邪驚啼 , “It controls the five types of evil [qi] and fright crying ”.
